txt_en: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
txt_cn: 获得朋友的唯一方法是成为别人的朋友。
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

txt_en: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
txt_cn: 爱自己是终身浪漫的开始。
author: Oscar Wilde

txt_en: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
txt_cn: 真正的朋友会在全世界与你为敌时站在你身边。
author: Walter Winchell

txt_en: One word frees us of all the weight and pain of life: That word is love.
txt_cn: 有一个字能让我们摆脱生活的压力与痛苦，这个字就是“爱”。
author: Sophocles

txt_en: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
txt_cn: 未来属于那些相信梦想之美的人。
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

txt_cn: 幸福与否我们自己说了算。
author: Aristotle

txt_en: You'll never be alone if you've got a book.
txt_cn: 只要手捧书卷，你就永远不会感到孤独。
author: Al Pacino

txt_en: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
txt_cn: 比起悲观，乐观会让你把所有事情做得更好。
author: Zig Ziglar

txt_en: That man is richest whose pleasures are cheapest.
txt_cn: 能轻易获得快乐的人最富有。
author: Henry David Thoreau

txt_en: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
txt_cn: 如果一天里没有欢笑，那这一天就被浪费了。
author: Charlie Chaplin

txt_en: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
txt_cn: 成功没有诀窍。成功是筹备，苦干以及在失败中汲取教训的结果。
author: Colin L. Powell

txt_en: Progress is the activity of today and the assurance of tomorrow.
txt_cn: 进步是今天的动力、明日的保证。
author: Emerson

txt_en: You have to believe in yourself. That's the secret of success.
txt_cn: 你必须相信自己，这是成功的秘诀。
author: Charles Chaplin

txt_en: Perseverance is failing nineteen times and succeeding the twentieth.
txt_cn: 十九次失败，到第二十次获得成功，这就叫坚持。
author: Julie Andrews

txt_en: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear, not absence of fear.
txt_cn: 勇敢并非没有恐惧，而是克服恐惧，战胜恐惧。
author: Mark Twain
